USDT.e: USDT is a stablecoin (cryptocurrency with stable value) pegged to the value of the US dollar, issued by Tether, headquartered in Hong Kong.
USDC: USDC is a stablecoin pegged 1:1 to the US dollar, backed by cash and US Treasury bonds. The Centre consortium claims it is issued by regulated financial institutions.
AURORA: Aurora Token is a governance tool for the Aurora blockchain, allowing users to vote on network changes and ecosystem development through AuroraDAO, guiding upgrades and decisions within the ecosystem.
REF: Ref Finance Token (REF) is the native utility token of the platform, used for governance and staking. Ref Finance is the main decentralized exchange (DEX) on the NEAR blockchain.
PARAS: PARAS Token is a utility token associated with the Paras ecosystem, particularly the Paras NFT market built on the NEAR Protocol blockchain.
OCT: OCT is the non-inflationary native utility token of the Octopus Network. The Octopus Network fosters interoperability and development of Web3.0 application-specific blockchains or appchains.
SWEAT: SWEAT is the native token of the Sweat Economy in the NEAR ecosystem, rewarding users with tokens for achieving physical activity goals, promoting health.
DAI: DAI is a decentralized stablecoin pegged 1:1 to the US dollar, backed by collateral and managed by the decentralized autonomous organization MakerDAO.
WBTC: WBTC is the tokenized representation of Bitcoin on other blockchains, enabling faster BTC transfers and utilization of NEAR features.
ETH: ETH is the native cryptocurrency of the Ethereum blockchain, used to support transactions and smart contracts, promoting decentralized applications and innovation.
nUSDO: nUSDO is a multi-chain stablecoin backed by cryptocurrency, pegged to the US dollar, issued by OIN Finance on the NEAR Protocol through OINDAO V3, providing stability and utility across blockchains.
xREF: xREF is the token associated with Ref Finance DEX, rewarding holders by repurchasing 75% of revenue generated on the Ref Finance platform.
GTC: Gitcoin is a platform for funding builders seeking meaningful open-source work.
1INCH: 1INCH Token serves as both a governance token and utility token in the 1inch Network, a DEX aggregator aiming to optimize user trades across multiple liquidity sources for better rates.
USDC.e: USDC.e is bridged USDC, a stablecoin pegged 1:1 to the US dollar, backed by cash and US Treasury bonds. The Centre consortium claims it is issued by regulated financial institutions.
CELO: Celo is a carbon-negative, permissionless blockchain, fostering a Web3 dapp ecosystem through global partnerships, aiming to create a more inclusive financial system.
SOL: SOL is the native token of Solana, a high-performance Layer 1 blockchain offering fast speeds and affordable costs, supporting smart contracts and dApps.
LINK: LINK is the token of the Chainlink Network, Chainlink is a framework for building decentralized oracle networks (DONs) bringing real-world data into blockchain networks.
BRRR: BRRR is the native token of Burrow, a non-custodial, pool-based interest platform on the NEAR blockchain, enabling users to provide assets for interest or borrow them for liquidity.
wNEAR: Wrapped Near is a 1:1 equivalent of Near, represented on the Near blockchain.
ABR: ABR Token is the native token of Allbridge, a modular and scalable token bridge with on-chain consensus.
NDC: NDC Token is the native token of the NEVERDIE platform, a decentralized gaming ecosystem running on the Ethereum blockchain.
USDt: USDT is a stablecoin (cryptocurrency with stable value) pegged to the value of the US dollar, issued by Tether, headquartered in Hong Kong.
LINEAR: LiNEAR Protocol is an un-custodial liquidity staking protocol built on the NEAR blockchain.
NEAT: NEAT sets a new standard for public token issuance on the NEAR blockchain, storing AI components to track AI models, enriching the ecosystem with a mechanism for creating digital assets.
WETH: WETH, or Wrapped Ether, allows Ethereum's native currency ETH to be traded as an ERC-20 token, facilitating interoperability and usability.
STNEAR: STNEAR, issued by MetaPool, represents staked NEAR, allowing holders to freely use the token in DeFi protocols for additional income while earning staking rewards.
USN: USN is the stablecoin of the NEAR Protocol, lightly pegged 1:1 to the US dollar, not backed by USD but by USDT and NEAR coins.
HOT: HOT is a token on the Near Protocol platform, using the Telegram wallet and addresses in the format <your_username.tg>.
